--- title: "2024 EFSPI regulatory statistics workshop" date: last-modified execute: freeze: auto # re-render only when source changes output: rmarkdown::html_document: highlight: pygments number_sections: yes self_contained: yes toc: no toc_depth: 2 toc_float: yes --- # What's new for the 2024 workshop? - Not new is that we keep the **registration fees at the same decent level**. This eventhough we extend the workshop by half a day, see next item. - We will have a dedicated HTA session on the Friday morning, see [program](https://efspieurope.github.io/workshop/data/2024/9th%20EFSPI%20RegStat%20Workshop%20program.pdf). - For the first time we will have a patient talking. # Date and venue of 2024 workshop The workshop will take place 11-13th September 2024 again in the beautiful [Biozentrum](https://www.biozentrum.unibas.ch/) in [Basel](https://www.basel.com/en).
![](biozentrum.jpg)

[Workshop program (status: 17th April 2024)](data/2024/9th EFSPI RegStat Workshop program.pdf) [Registration](https://forms.gle/JWc1ZyUKxq5Lhhwf6) Members of [local organizing committee](local.html). Members of [scientific committee](scicom.html). # Call for short topics See [linkedin post](). Deadline for submissions is 15th August 2024. # Updates to program See [here](updates.html).
